meta.name: UCR Stitch
meta.description: Origins for a modded Minecraft server lol

additional_fishing/.pull_mobs:
# Credit to IndustrialCraft on Github for this clever method!

# Fishing Guardian
execute as @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "guardian"}}}] positioned as @s run summon item ~ ~ ~ {Tags: [CMD_FishingMomentumAdd], Age: 5920, PickupDelay: 32767, Item: {id: "minecraft:stone", Count: 1b}, Passengers: [{id: "minecraft:guardian"}]}
data modify entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,tag=CMD_FishingMomentumAdd] Motion set from entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "guardian"}}}] Motion
kill @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "guardian"}}}]

# Fishing Drowned
execute as @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "drowned"}}}] positioned as @s run summon item ~ ~ ~ {Tags: [CMD_FishingMomentumAdd], Age: 5920, PickupDelay: 32767, Item: {id: "minecraft:stone", Count: 1b}, Passengers: [{id: "minecraft:drowned"}]}
data modify entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,tag=CMD_FishingMomentumAdd] Motion set from entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "drowned"}}}] Motion
kill @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "drowned"}}}]

# Fishing Elder Guardian
execute as @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "elder_guardian"}}}] positioned as @s run summon item ~ ~ ~ {Tags: [CMD_FishingMomentumAdd], Age: 5920, PickupDelay: 32767, Item: {id: "minecraft:stone", Count: 1b}, Passengers: [{id: "minecraft:elder_guardian"}]}
data modify entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,tag=CMD_FishingMomentumAdd] Motion set from entity @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "elder_guardian"}}}] Motion
kill @e[type=item,limit=1,sort=nearest,nbt={Item: {tag: {CMD_FishingSpawnType: "elder_guardian"}}}]

functions/.age_check:
execute as @s store result score @s CMD_AgeCheck run data get entity @s Age

# If adult, set to 1
scoreboard players set @s[scores={CMD_AgeCheck=0..}] CMD_AgeCheck 1

# If child, set to 0
scoreboard players set @s[scores={CMD_AgeCheck=..0}] CMD_AgeCheck 0

bigotry/.aggro_manager:
# Turn on aggro!
execute at @s run tag @e[type=#ucr_stitch:bigots,distance=..20] add CMD_BigotTag
tag @s add CMD_BigotTarget
execute as @e[tag=CMD_BigotTag] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @e[tag=CMD_BigotTarget,limit=1] UUID
execute as @e[tag=CMD_BigotTag] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 60

tag @s remove CMD_BigotTarget
tag @e[tag=CMD_BigotTag] remove CMD_BigotTag


# Turn off aggro :3
execute at @s run tag @e[type=#ucr_stitch:bigots,distance=21..40] add CMD_BigotTag
execute as @e[tag=CMD_BigotTag] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @s UUID
execute as @e[tag=CMD_BigotTag] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 0

tag @e[tag=CMD_BigotTag] remove CMD_BigotTag

greater_mending/.loop:
execute store result score @s CMD_GM_Points run xp query @s points
execute store result score @s CMD_GM_Levels run xp query @s levels

tag @s remove CMD_GM_MendIt
tag @s[scores={CMD_GM_Points=2..}] add CMD_GM_MendIt
tag @s[scores={CMD_GM_Levels=1..}] add CMD_GM_MendIt
tag @s[scores={CMD_GM_Damage=..0}] remove CMD_GM_MendIt

xp add @s[tag=CMD_GM_MendIt] -2 points
scoreboard players remove @s[tag=CMD_GM_MendIt] CMD_GM_Points 3
scoreboard players set @s[scores={CMD_GM_Damage=..0}] CMD_GM_Points 0

execute as @s[tag=CMD_GM_MendIt] run function ucr_stitch:greater_mending/loop
greater_mending/.start:
execute store result score @s CMD_GM_Damage run data get entity @s SelectedItem.tag.Damage

function ucr_stitch:greater_mending/loop

item modify entity @s weapon.mainhand ucr_stitch:gm_damage

reflect/.calc_motion:
execute anchored eyes run tp @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] @s

execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] store result score @s CMD_ReflectXM run data get entity @s Pos[0] 100
execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] store result score @s CMD_ReflectYM run data get entity @s Pos[1] 100
execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] store result score @s CMD_ReflectZM run data get entity @s Pos[2] 100

execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] run tp @s ^ ^ ^10

execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] store result score @s CMD_Temp run data get entity @s Pos[0] 100
scoreboard players operation @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_ReflectXM -= @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_Temp

execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] store result score @s CMD_Temp run data get entity @s Pos[1] 100
scoreboard players operation @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_ReflectYM -= @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_Temp

execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] store result score @s CMD_Temp run data get entity @s Pos[2] 100
scoreboard players operation @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_ReflectZM -= @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_Temp
reflect/.reflect_projectiles:
tp @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] ^ ^ ^1

execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] at @s run tp ~ ~1.25 ~

execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] at @s run tag @e[type=#ucr_stitch:reflectable_projectiles,distance=..2] add CMD_Reflect_Projectiles

execute anchored eyes run tp @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Projectiles] ~ ~1.25 ~
execute as @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Projectiles] at @s run function ucr_stitch:reflect/set_self_reflected
reflect/.set_self_reflected:
data modify entity @s Owner set from entity @p[tag=CMD_Reflect_Player] UUID

execute store result entity @s Motion[0] double -0.002 run scoreboard players get @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_ReflectXM
execute store result entity @s Motion[1] double -0.002 run scoreboard players get @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_ReflectYM
execute store result entity @s Motion[2] double -0.002 run scoreboard players get @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1] CMD_ReflectZM
reflect/.start:
tag @s add CMD_Reflect_Player

# Summon armor stand that helps with direction calculations.
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {NoGravity:1b,Silent:1b,Invulnerable:1b,ShowArms:0b,Small:1b,Marker:1b,Invisible:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,PersistenceRequired:1b,Tags:["CMD_Reflect_Helper"],DisabledSlots:4144959}

function ucr_stitch:reflect/calc_motion
title @p actionbar ["","DEBUG: ",{"score":{"name":"@e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1]","objective":"CMD_ReflectXM"}}," ",{"score":{"name":"@e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1]","objective":"CMD_ReflectYM"}}," ",{"score":{"name":"@e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper,limit=1]","objective":"CMD_ReflectZM"}}]
function ucr_stitch:reflect/reflect_projectiles

tag @s remove CMD_Reflect_Player
tag @e remove CMD_Reflect_Projectiles
kill @e[tag=CMD_Reflect_Helper]

skate_blades/.ice_check:
scoreboard players set @s CMD_SkaterJmp 0
execute as @s at @s if block ~ ~-1 ~ #minecraft:ice run scoreboard players set @s CMD_SkaterJmp 1

functions/.sleeping_check: execute store success score @s CMD_IsSleeping run data get entity @s SleepingX

brittle/.hpcheck:
#scoreboard objectives add CMD_Temp dummy
#scoreboard objectives add CMD_Brittle_Health health
#scoreboard objectives add CMD_Brittle_LastHP dummy
#scoreboard objectives add CMD_Brittle_MaxHP dummy

# Calculate half of the MaxHP
scoreboard players set @s CMD_Temp 2
execute store result score @s CMD_Brittle_MaxHP run attribute @s minecraft:generic.max_health get
scoreboard players operation @s CMD_Brittle_MaxHP /= @s CMD_Temp

# Calculate Damage taken in the last tick
scoreboard players operation @s CMD_Temp = @s CMD_Brittle_LastHP
scoreboard players operation @s CMD_Temp -= @s CMD_Brittle_Health

scoreboard players operation @s CMD_Temp -= @s CMD_Brittle_MaxHP

# Finally, set the LastHP as the HP this tick,
# so calculations work on the next tick!
scoreboard players operation @s CMD_Brittle_LastHP = @s CMD_Brittle_Health

# Output: if CMD_Temp is positive, then true, and kill the player. Otherwise false.
brittle/.death_effects:
playsound minecraft:block.glass.break player @a ~ ~ ~ 5 0.3
playsound minecraft:block.glass.break player @a ~ ~ ~ 5 0.8
particle minecraft:item_snowball ~ ~1 ~ 0.7 0.7 0.7 0.5 50 normal

fairy/.rush_of_vitality_start:
particle minecraft:glow ~ ~0.5 ~ 0.7 0.7 0.7 1 20 force

playsound minecraft:entity.allay.ambient_without_item player @a ~ ~ ~ 5 1.5
playsound minecraft:entity.allay.item_given player @a ~ ~ ~ 5 1
fairy/.rush_of_vitality_jump:
playsound minecraft:entity.allay.item_thrown player @a ~ ~ ~ 3 0.6
playsound minecraft:entity.allay.hurt player @a ~ ~ ~ 3 0.6

particle minecraft:cloud ~ ~0.1 ~ 0 0 0 0.1 10 force
fairy/.rush_of_vitality_trail_chance:
playsound minecraft:entity.allay.ambient_with_item player @a ~ ~ ~ 0.5 0.7
playsound minecraft:entity.allay.death player @a ~ ~ ~ 0.5 1.5

battle/.blood: execute as @s at @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:dust 1.0 0.0 0.0 1 ^ ^ ^ 0.3 0.5 0.3 0.8 50 force
battle/.ei_on:
tellraw @s ["",{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"dark_red"},{"text":" Your melee blows are now empowered! ","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"dark_red"}]
playsound minecraft:block.respawn_anchor.set_spawn player @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1.4
battle/.ei_off:
tellraw @s ["",{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"dark_red"},{"text":" Your melee blows are no longer empowered! ","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"dark_red"}]
playsound minecraft:block.respawn_anchor.deplete player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 1.4
battle/.ei_hit:
execute as @s at @s anchored eyes run particle minecraft:glow ^ ^ ^ 0.15 0.15 0.15 1.2 8 normal
playsound minecraft:block.anvil.land player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.5

ice/.ft_on:
tellraw @s ["",{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"aqua"},{"text":" Frost Walker activated! ","color":"dark_blue"},{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"aqua"}]
playsound minecraft:block.glass.place player @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1.5
ice/.ft_off:
tellraw @s ["",{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"aqua"},{"text":" Frost Walker deactivated! ","color":"dark_blue"},{"text":"222","obfuscated":true,"color":"aqua"}]
playsound minecraft:block.glass.break player @s ~ ~ ~ 1 1.5

water/.guard_laser_active:
playsound minecraft:entity.guardian.attack player @a ~ ~ ~ 3 0.8
playsound minecraft:block.respawn_anchor.charge player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.8

mages/.essence_transfer:
# essence_temp = amount of free space in essence bar
resource set @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_temp 500
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run resource get @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_real
resource operation @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_temp -= @s CMD_Temp

# essence_temp = amount to add to the main essence bar
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run resource get @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_input
resource operation @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_temp < @s CMD_Temp

# transfer the necessary amount to the main essence bar
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run resource get @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_temp
resource operation @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_real += @s CMD_Temp
resource operation @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_input -= @s CMD_Temp

# transfer the remaining essence into the regen bar
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run resource get @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_input
resource operation @s ucr_stitch:mage/hungerless_regen_essence += @s CMD_Temp
resource set @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_input 0
resource set @s ucr_stitch:mage/essence_temp 0

air/.mighty_gust_helper:
execute as @e[distance=..7] at @s run tp @s ~ ~0.1 ~

tag @s add CMD_Reflect_Player

execute as @e[distance=..7,type=#ucr_stitch:reflectable_projectiles] run data modify entity @s Owner set from entity @p[tag=CMD_Reflect_Player] UUID

tag @s remove CMD_Reflect_Player

time/.time_stop_mobs_start: data modify entity @s NoAI set value true
time/.time_stop_mobs_end: data modify entity @s NoAI set value false

fire/.lb_explode:
particle minecraft:flame ~ ~0.5 ~ 0.5 0.5 0.5 0.3 60 force
playsound minecraft:entity.firework_rocket.blast player @a ~ ~ ~ 3 0.8
playsound minecraft:entity.firework_rocket.twinkle player @a ~ ~ ~ 3 0.9

traveling_merchant/.refresh_trades:
# @s = the villager that needs the refresh!

# Temp = Villager's Level
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run data get entity @s VillagerData.level 1

# Workaround for some stuff. To complicated to explain here. 
# Just know that this will be used as the Recipient's Villager Data from now on
data modify storage ucr_stitch:temp VillagerData set from entity @s VillagerData

data modify entity @s Offers.Recipes set value []

function ucr_stitch:traveling_merchant/refresh_trades_loop
traveling_merchant/.refresh_trades_loop:
summon villager ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["CMD_RefTrades_Donor"]}

# Change VillagerData level, then copy Recipient's State to Donor
execute store result storage ucr_stitch:temp VillagerData.level int 1 run scoreboard players get @s CMD_Temp
data modify entity @e[tag=CMD_RefTrades_Donor,limit=1,sort=nearest] VillagerData set from storage ucr_stitch:temp VillagerData

# Copy Trades from Donor to Recipient
data modify entity @s Offers.Recipes prepend from entity @e[tag=CMD_RefTrades_Donor,limit=1,sort=nearest] Offers.Recipes[2]
data modify entity @s Offers.Recipes prepend from entity @e[tag=CMD_RefTrades_Donor,limit=1,sort=nearest] Offers.Recipes[1]
data modify entity @s Offers.Recipes prepend from entity @e[tag=CMD_RefTrades_Donor,limit=1,sort=nearest] Offers.Recipes[0]

# Get rid of Donor
tp @e[tag=CMD_RefTrades_Donor] ~ -1000 ~
kill @e[tag=CMD_RefTrades_Donor]

# Continue loop
scoreboard players remove @s CMD_Temp 1
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=1..}] run function ucr_stitch:traveling_merchant/refresh_trades_loop
traveling_merchant/.clear_type: data modify entity @s VillagerData.profession set value "minecraft:none"
traveling_merchant/.increase_age:
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run data get entity @s Age
scoreboard players add @s CMD_Temp 2400
execute store result entity @s Age int 1 run scoreboard players get @s CMD_Temp
traveling_merchant/.great_opinion:
# @s = the villager
# @p[tag=CMD_TravelingMerchant] = merchant

data modify storage ucr_stitch:temp great_gossip set value {Type: "trading", Value: 20, Target: [I; 0, 0, 0]}
data modify storage ucr_stitch:temp great_gossip.Target set from entity @a[tag=CMD_TravelingMerchant,limit=1] UUID
data modify entity @s Gossips append from storage ucr_stitch:temp great_gossip

witch/.wand_bounce:
power grant @s ucr_stitch:witch/wand_effect
resource operation @s ucr_stitch:witch/wand_effect_damage > @s CMD_WBDMG
scoreboard players remove @s CMD_WBDMG 1

tag @s add CMD_DamageDonor
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3] run scoreboard players operation @s CMD_WBDMG2 = @s CMD_WBDMG
execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3] run scoreboard players operation @s CMD_WBDMG > @e[tag=CMD_DamageDonor,limit=1] CMD_WBDMG
tag @s remove CMD_DamageDonor

execute as @e[type=!minecraft:player,distance=..3] at @s if score @s CMD_WBDMG > @s CMD_WBDMG2 run function ucr_stitch:witch/wand_bounce
witch/.wand_clear_var:
# This needs to be called once by the original caster after everything is done!

scoreboard players reset @e CMD_WBDMG
scoreboard players reset @e CMD_WBDMG2
witch/.set_potion:
# Check if there is a potion in main hand
# By checking the following tags: Potion and CustomPotionEffects

execute store success score @s CMD_Temp run data get entity @s SelectedItem.tag.Potion
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=0}] store success score @s CMD_Temp run data get entity @s SelectedItem.tag.CustomPotionEffects
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=1}] run data modify entity @e[tag=CMD_WitchPotion,limit=1] Item set from entity @s SelectedItem

# If neither pass, we assume the potion is in the offhand

execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=0}] run data modify entity @e[tag=CMD_WitchPotion,limit=1] Item set from entity @s Inventory[{Slot:-106b}]

data modify entity @e[tag=CMD_WitchPotion,limit=1] Item.id set value "minecraft:splash_potion"

tag @e remove CMD_WitchPotion
witch/.drop_slowness:
playsound minecraft:entity.witch.throw player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 0.7

summon potion ~ ~-0.3 ~ {Motion:[0.0,-0.5,0.0],Tags:["CMD_WitchPotion"],Item:{id:"minecraft:splash_potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"minecraft:slowness"}}}
data modify entity @e[tag=CMD_WitchPotion,limit=1] Owner set from entity @s UUID

tag @e remove CMD_WitchPotion
witch/.drop_weakness:
playsound minecraft:entity.witch.throw player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 1

summon potion ~ ~-0.3 ~ {Motion:[0.0,-0.5,0.0],Tags:["CMD_WitchPotion"],Item:{id:"minecraft:splash_potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"minecraft:weakness"}}}
data modify entity @e[tag=CMD_WitchPotion,limit=1] Owner set from entity @s UUID

tag @e remove CMD_WitchPotion
witch/.drop_poison:
playsound minecraft:entity.witch.throw player @a ~ ~ ~ 1 1.3

summon potion ~ ~-0.3 ~ {Motion:[0.0,-0.5,0.0],Tags:["CMD_WitchPotion"],Item:{id:"minecraft:splash_potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"minecraft:poison"}}}
data modify entity @e[tag=CMD_WitchPotion,limit=1] Owner set from entity @s UUID

tag @e remove CMD_WitchPotion

functions/.load:
# Greater Mending Variables
scoreboard objectives add CMD_GM_Damage dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_GM_Points dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_GM_Levels dummy

scoreboard objectives add CMD_AgeCheck dummy

scoreboard objectives add CMD_IsSleeping dummy

# Setting Temp and Motion Scores
scoreboard objectives add CMD_Temp dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_ReflectXM dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_ReflectYM dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_ReflectZM dummy

scoreboard objectives add CMD_SkaterJmp dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_FrogJmp dummy

scoreboard objectives add CMD_Brittle_Health health
scoreboard objectives add CMD_Brittle_LastHP dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_Brittle_MaxHP dummy

scoreboard objectives add CMD_WBDMG dummy
scoreboard objectives add CMD_WBDMG2 dummy

skill_point_reset/.start:
# Give a bunch of refunds, it is capped at how many points were spent
playerex refund @s 500

# Start recursively removing skill points, one by one . . .
function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/constitution
function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/dexterity
function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/intelligence
function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/luckiness
function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/strength

# Play a sound and display a message to let the player know that the operation was successful!
playsound minecraft:entity.experience_orb.pickup player @s ~ ~ ~ 1 0.5
playsound minecraft:entity.allay.item_thrown player @s ~ ~ ~ 1 0.8
tellraw @s {"text":"Your power has been severed from your body ...","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"}
tellraw @s {"text":"... But in its place sprouted the will to start anew.","bold":true,"color":"gold"}
skill_point_reset/.constitution:
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run playerex refund_attribute @s playerex:constitution true
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=1..}] run function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/constitution
skill_point_reset/.strength:
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run playerex refund_attribute @s playerex:strength true
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=1..}] run function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/strength
skill_point_reset/.dexterity:
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run playerex refund_attribute @s playerex:dexterity true
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=1..}] run function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/dexterity
skill_point_reset/.intelligence:
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run playerex refund_attribute @s playerex:intelligence true
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=1..}] run function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/intelligence
skill_point_reset/.luckiness:
execute store result score @s CMD_Temp run playerex refund_attribute @s playerex:luckiness true
execute as @s[scores={CMD_Temp=1..}] run function ucr_stitch:skill_point_reset/luckiness

explorer.name: Explorer
explorer.description: None have traveled farther and wider than this brave soul!

mounted_marksman.name: Mounted Marksman
mounted_marksman.description: Their most trusted friend is their trusty steed . . . Or boat.

skater.name: Ice Skater
skater.description: Decades of excercising Ice Skating made you able to skate anywhere, and on anything!

tickle_trickster.name: Tickle Trickster
tickle_trickster.description: You dedicated your entire life to making others laugh. So much so that you made it your entire defense mechanism.

demolitionist.name: Demolitionist
demolitionist.description: The answer to all of your problems is ALWAYS more explosives!

late_bloomer.name: Late Bloomer
late_bloomer.description: Not ready to choose yet? I understand.

merling_p.name: Merling+
merling_p.description: A rendition of the classic Mermaid origin, but with the small bonus of spawning in/near water!

avian_p.name: Avian+
avian_p.description: A rendition of the classic Avian origin, with the removal of the Vegetarian downside!

mage.name: Mage
mage.description: Studying magic for decades, you will now be able to put it to the test!

battle.name: Battle Mage
battle.description: Strong, fierce. Managed to strike a perfect balance between magic and brute force!

ice.name: Ice Mage
ice.description: Ironically, they never mastered freeze spells on anything other than water.

water.name: Water Mage
water.description: Spent years studying sealife, so much so that they developed a natural affinity in water.

air.name: Air Mage
air.description: Even though the lore makes you light as a feather, no, you won't have Slow Fall priviliges.

time.name: Time Mage
time.description: The ability to control time is not an exact science . . .

fire.name: Fire Mage
fire.description: May be a little clumsier than the rest, but nobody tells this to their face.

witch.name: Witch
witch.description: May brew some terrible concoctions of mischief and destruction

lavaling.name: Lavaling
lavaling.description: The flames of The Nether beckon your flesh. And you are ready to heed their call!

athletic.name: Athletic
athletic.description: You lose hunger half as fast.

backpack.name: Backpack
backpack.description: Open a 27-slot bonus inventory. Sadly, the weight of it makes it harder to fight, giving you -2 Attack Damage and -0.5 Attack Speed.

daring_dish.name: Daring Dish
daring_dish.description: Food restores double Hunger and Saturation when you're at 6 hunger points or less.

explorer_instinct.name: Explorer's Instinct
explorer_instinct.description: You can create explorer maps on the fly using regular maps, being as accurate as the top cartographers of our time! Sadly, though, who knows what the X marks? (120 second cooldown)

night_vision_goggles.name: Night Vision Goggles
night_vision_goggles.description: You have permanent Night Vision. Can be toggled while you don't have a Map or Filled Map in your hand.

farmhand_klutz.name: Farmhand Klutz
farmhand_klutz.description: Breeding animals yourself will make them unwilling to do it again for twice as long. Crops broken by you have a 30% chance of not dropping anything.

family_values.name: Family Values
family_values.description: Wearing a leather boot and a leather cap has always been a tradition in your family. If you deviate, you lose your title of Hoe Master.

good_food.name: Good Food
good_food.description: Working hard all day has shown you the wonders of the food you make. Whenever you eat food, you get 2 extra Hunger and 2 extra Saturation restored.

hoe_master.name: Hoe Master
hoe_master.description: Tilling dirt for decades has made you able to make the most out of it. Hoes in your hand give you +4 Attack Damage.

unwieldy.name: Unwieldy
unwieldy.description: Weapons other than hoes are too complicated to wrap your head around, dealing 1 less damage with them.

curse_of_the_sea.name: Curse of the Sea
curse_of_the_sea.description: You are good at fishing! Maybe too good . . . Drowned, Guardians and Elder Guardians may randomly appear when you are fishing.

debilitate.name: Debilitate
debilitate.description: Gain +3 Attack Damage and +2 Looting while you hold a Fishing Rod in your main hand.

lure_or_luck.name: Lure or Luck
lure_or_luck.description: You have +2 Lure and -1 Luck of the Sea. Toggle this ability to change it to +2 Luck of the Sea and -1 Lure instead.

if_action.command: tellraw @p {"text":"You now have +2 Luck of the Sea and -1 Lure!","color":"blue"}

else_action.command: tellraw @p {"text":"You now have +2 Lure and -1 Luck of the Sea!","color":"blue"}

fragile.name: Fragile
fragile.description: Your Armor is always reduced by 20%.

bullseye.name: Bullseye
bullseye.description: Hitting living entities with arrows increases the damage they take from subsequent arrow shots by 15%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts up to 10 seconds.

master_rider.name: Master Rider
master_rider.description: Any living entity you ride gets +30% Speed. Horses also get +50% Jump Strength.

master_rider_effect.name: Master Rider Effect
master_rider_effect.description: Gain +30% Speed. If you're a horse, also gain Jump Strength. Lasts while a Mounted Marksman rides you!

nyctophobia.name: Nyctophobia
nyctophobia.description: You become uncertain in the dark. Gain Blindness whenever you're at Light Level 5 or under.

condition.command: execute anchored eyes if predicate ucr_stitch:light_max_five

projectile_reflect.name: Projectile Reflect
projectile_reflect.description: Using the Attack Key sends all incoming projectiles in the direction you're looking in.

born_in_the_cold.name: Born in the Cold
born_in_the_cold.description: You start in a Snowy Taiga. Immune to Freezing damage. Hot biomes give you Weakness and Slowness unless there is any ice or snow block nearby.

cold_snack.name: Cold Snack
cold_snack.description:
You can eat Ice, Packed Ice and Blue Ice, giving you Regeneration.
Ice: Regeneration I for 4 seconds.
Packed Ice: Regeneration II for 8 seconds.
Blue Ice: Regeneration III for 16 seconds.

running_start.name: Running Start
running_start.description: Switch Slippery Boots on and launch yourself in the direction you are looking horizontally, gaining Jump Boost II and Speed II for 5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 15 seconds.

skate_blades.name: Skate Blades
skate_blades.description: You have 20% increased movement speed and +0.5 jump height when on ice or when you have your Slippery Shoes on.

slippery_shoes.name: Slippery Shoes
slippery_shoes.description: You have ice movement physics on all blocks. Weee! You can take off your fancy skates and toggle this perk on/off when you want to!

continuation.name: Continuation
continuation.description: You spawn and respawn with a Feather already in your inventory.

pacifist.name: Pacifist
pacifist.description: You want to tickle mobs, not kill them! If you kill a mob, you feel so bad your heart shatters, taking 10 Damage instantly.

self_treatment.name: Self Treatment
self_treatment.description: Activate to gain -80% Speed and regenerate 1 Health every 7 ticks. Lasts until the ability is used again. 10 second cooldown.

self_treatment_simple.name: Self Treatment
self_treatment_simple.description: Gain Slowness V and Regeneration III for 5 seconds. 10 second cooldown.

tickle_feather.name: Tickle Feather
tickle_feather.description: When you have a feather in your main hand, you deal no damage. Living entities you hit like this get -80% movement speed for as long as you are within 10 blocks of them. When you land a hit on a mob like this without the effect already on them, you gain +1 Hunger, +1 Saturation and +2 Health.

action.command: summon item ~ ~ ~ {Age:5800,PickupDelay:0,Item:{id:"minecraft:milk_bucket",Count:1b,tag:{display:{Name:'{"text":"\'\' M i l k \'\'","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Don\'t ask where this came from.","color":"white","italic":false}']}}}}

blast_jump.name: Blast Jump
blast_jump.description: After a 0.5 second wind-up, summon a small explosion and blast yourself in the direction you are looking. has a cooldown of 15 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

blast_protection_pp.name: Blast Protection++
blast_protection_pp.description: You take 40% less damage from explosives and firework rockets.

improvisation.name: Improvisation
improvisation.description:
Create an explosion at your feet with the strength of a TNT. 60 second cooldown.
Passive: Killing mobs with explosions or fireworks reduces the cooldown by 10 seconds.

too_much_fun.name: Too Much Fun
too_much_fun.description: You never learned how to use tools effectively because you found it too much fun to just break stuff with explosions. Your mining speed is reduced by 20%.

indecision.name: Indecision
indecision.description: Use this ability when you're ready to choose an origin!

brittle.name: Brittle
brittle.description: Taking half of your Maximum Health as damage or more instantly makes you shatter.

tiny_stature.name: Tiny Stature
tiny_stature.description: You are tiny! Youre 40% as big as a human, but your reach distance is doubled to compensate.

fairy_flight.name: Fairy Flight
fairy_flight.description: You can fly like in creative mode, but its tied to your Flight Energy, which starts off at 100 and charges by 5 every second. Flying drains 10 energy every second. If you use up all of your Flight Energy, you cannot fly until you filled up at least 25% of the bar! You cannot recover Flight Evergy while flying with an Elytra or Creative Flight.

rush_of_vitality.name: Rush of Vitality
rush_of_vitality.description: Gain +60% Movement Speed and greatly increased Jump Height for 10 seconds. 60 second cooldown. Cooldown cannot be recovered while the ability is active!

flower_magic.name: Flower Magic
flower_magic.description: You can consume Flowers in exchange for 10 seconds off of Rush of Vitality's cooldown and +20 Flight Energy.

spawn_in_water.name: Water Spawn
spawn_in_water.description: Spawn inside of, or very close to, water!

zeus_wraith.name: Zeus's Wraith
zeus_wraith.description: While exposed to the sky during a rain or thunderstorm, lightning might strike you unexpectedly!

essence.name: Essence
essence.description: You have an Essence Meter, with a maximum value of 500. You passively regenerate 20 Essence per second.

hungerless.name: Hungerless
hungerless.description: You don't have a hunger bar, so you cannot eat, and don't have passive health regen. Instead, you regenerate half a heart per 50 excess Essence you accumulated every 0.25 seconds.

spirit_runner.name: Spirit Runner
spirit_runner.description: Instead of Hunger, sprinting consumes Essence, at a rate of 4 Essence every 4 ticks. You cannot sprint while below 50 Essence.

specialization.name: Specialization
specialization.description: Choose your abilities and additional perks after you choose this origin.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Teleport a short distance in the direction you are moving. Costs 120 Mana. Cooldown of 1 second.

spirit_of_war.name: Spirit Of War
spirit_of_war.description: The blood of your enemies heals you for 4 every time you hit them if you are close enough to them, but Hungerless's regeneration is disabled!

essence_infusion.name: Essence Infusion
essence_infusion.description: You can infuse your blows with your inner power, making them deal 25% more Damage, but draining your Essence by 80 every time you do so. Can be toggled on or off.

snowball_salvo.name: Snowball Salvo
snowball_salvo.description: Activate to throw 5 Snowballs with +2 Damage in rapid succession. These Snowballs also apply Slowness II and Mining Fatigue I for 3 seconds (20 second cooldown, 100 Essence)

frost_traveler.name: Frost Traveler
frost_traveler.description: You can toggle between having Frost Walker 0 and Frost Walker 2, regardless of what level of Frost Walker your boots have! Additionally, this Frost Walker can be transmitted to living entities you ride. Having it on costs 10 Mana per second.

icy_veins.name: Icy Veins
icy_veins.description: Your Movement Speed and Attack Speed are reduced by 10%. Due to technical issues, you also cannot throw snowballs!

frost_traveler_effect.name: Frost Traveler Effect
frost_traveler_effect.description: Sets your Frost Walker level to the level of the Ice Mage riding you

diving_champion.name: Diving Champion
diving_champion.description: Years of studying sea life made you move with ease in water! You can see clearly underwater, increased swimming speed, and +1 Respiration.

duality_of_the_sea.name: Duality of the Sea
duality_of_the_sea.description: You feel uneasy unless you touch water periodically, gaining Slowness I and Weakness I, but you lose all Respiration you have once you run out of air.

guardian_magic.name: Guardian Magic
guardian_magic.description: Mimic a Guardian's laser attack, dealing 10 Damage after a delay of 2 seconds. During this time, you cannot use items or attack. Has a maximum range of 30 blocks. No cooldown, costs 100 Essence.

propel.name: Propel
propel.description: Propel yourself in the direction you are looking horizontally, and upwards vertically. If you are stationary horizontally, you are only launched upwards. Consumes 60 Mana per cast.

mighty_gust.name: Mighty Gust
mighty_gust.description: Create a whirlpool around you, pushing all entities within 70 blocks away from you. If you are sneaking, push them upward instead. Deals 2 Magic Damage. Consumes 140 Essence per cast. Projectiles affected are reassigned to be under your name!

time_stop.name: Time Stop
time_stop.description: Stop an entity in time, making them unable to move or do anything an storing their state, but they will be immune to damage. Lasts 10 seconds on mobs and 5 seconds on players. Costs 150 Essence, and has a cooldown of 30 seconds. Has a max range of 10 blocks.

time_stop_effect.name: Time Stop Effect
time_stop_effect.description: Velocity and damage in and out are nullified. Healing and item use are disabled.

fast_forward.name: Fast Forward
fast_forward.description: Instantly refresh Time Stop's cooldown, then gain +30% Movement Speed, +50% Mining Speed and 1.5 Attack Speed. Lasts 15 seconds. Costs 250 Essence. Has a cooldown of 30 seconds.

clockwork_failure.name: Clockwork Failure
clockwork_failure.description: Dropping below 200 Essence makes you 20% Slower and Weaker. Dropping below 100 prevents sprinting and makes you 20% Slower and 40% Weaker instead.

fireballs.name: Fireballs
fireballs.description: Shoot 3 Blaze Fireballs in rapid succession (10 second cooldown, 100 Essence)

living_bomb.name: Living Bomb
living_bomb.description: Ignite an enemy for 3 seconds. Once they are put out, they explode in a fiery explosion that does not alter terrain, taking 6 damage and being ignited again for 5 seconds. Others caught in the explosion take 8 damage and are lit on fire for 8 seconds. Max range of 15 blocks. (20 seconds, 250 Essence)

living_bomb_effect.name: Living Bomb Effect
living_bomb_effect.description: When extinguished, blow up in a fiery explosion

burn_affinity.name: Burn Affinity
burn_affinity.description: You may have mastered creating fire and harnessing its power, but you sure are not immune to it. You take double fire damage, but you regenerate 50 Essence whenever you take fire damage.

business_advice.name: Business Advice
business_advice.description: Talk with a Villager and give them an emerald. If they are a child, advance their education. If they are a Nitwit, convince them to go job hunting. If they are an Apprentice or above in a field, convince them to switch up their shop. Either way, they will be greatful for the conversation! (Cooldown: 30 seconds)

else_action.command: title @a actionbar {"text":"You have to hold an Emerald in your main hand!","bold":true,"color":"dark_green"}

nightly_fright.name: Nightly Fright
nightly_fright.description: While you have no armor on or items on hand, you are Invisible during the night.

crippling_fear.name: Crippling Fear
crippling_fear.description: You cannot sprint for 5 seconds after taking damage. Nightly Fright is also disabled for the duration.

wand.name: Witch: Great Wand
wand.description: Zap a foe with arcane power, dealing 6 Damage. Then, every mob within 3 blocks of them is also zapped for 1 less damage, and so on. The maximum distance from you is 24 blocks. Has a cooldown of 30 seconds if you hit, or 1 second if you miss.

wand_effect.name: Wand Effect
wand_effect.description: This marks every entity that should be hit by the wand. Huge jank incoming!

ethereal_bottle.name: Witch: Ethereal Bottle
ethereal_bottle.description: Throw a splash potion copy of the potion you are holding with greater strength. The cooldown is 1 minute and is shared with Special Delivery.

special_delivery.name: Broom: Special Delivery
special_delivery.description: Drop a Potion of Slowness, Weakness and Poison under you in rapid succession. The cooldown is 1 minute and is shared with Ethereal Bottle.

booster.name: Broom: Booster
booster.description: Accelerate your broom for 3 seconds. During this, it starts emitting a harmful magic aura in a 2 block radius, dealing 5 Magic Damage constantly. Has a cooldown of 15 seconds.

booster_old.name: Broom: Booster
booster_old.description: Accelerate your broom for 3 seconds. During this, it starts emitting a harmful magic aura in a 2 block radius, dealing 5 Magic Damage every 0.5 seconds. Has a cooldown of 15 seconds.

booster_effect_old.name: Booster Effect
booster_effect_old.description: All motion is increased by 60% and whenever this collides with something, it deals 5 Magic Damage.

alchemical_potency.name: Alchemical Potency
alchemical_potency.description: Positive status effects you receive have +1 level. (Currently, all effects are. This will be fixed when the modlist is finalized)

pillager_lookalike.name: Pillager Lookalike
pillager_lookalike.description: You refuse to take a side in the Villager-Pillager war. However, nor Villagers, nor Pillagers trust you, and Iron Golems attack you on sight.

lava_vision.name: Burning Eyes
lava_vision.description: Your eyes can see much better under lava than any other creature!

lava_affinity.name: Lava Affinity
lava_affinity.description: Your mining speed is not hindered by the thickness of the lava surrounding you

lava_breathing.name: slliG
lava_breathing.description: You can breathe under lava, but not outside of it.

lava_speed.name: sniF
lava_speed.description: You can swim in lava and your speed is also increased!

fire_immunity.name: Fire Immunity
fire_immunity.description: You are immune to fire damage. You are also immune to fall damage while in lava.
